author: Cixin Liu

title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
author: Matt Dinniman
description: The apocalypse will be televised! A man. His ex-girlfriend's cat. A sadistic game show unlike anything in the universe: a dungeon crawl where survival depends on killing your prey in the most entertaining ways possible. In a flash, every human-erected construction on Earth--from Buckingham Palace to the tiniest of sheds--collapses in a heap, sinking into the ground. The buildings and all the people inside have all been atomized and transformed into the dungeon: an 18-level labyrinth teeming with traps, monsters, and loot.

author: Matt Dinniman

title: Dungeon Crawler Carl: The Gate of the Feral Gods
author: Matt Dinniman

title: Azarinth Healer
author: Rhaegar
description: A new world with nearly unlimited possibilities awaits. A new life in a new world. When Isekaied to a strange world I didn't expect to be blessed with a gamer like system that has multiplayer support. Turns out the gods were looking for a way to make their world more interesting. A healer that can tank like a boss, heal like a goddess, and deal damage like a demon. Scorned by her class, Ilea rises from the lowest rank to become one of the most powerful adventurers in her world.
coverQuery: Azarinth Healer Rhaegar book cover

title: The Wandering Inn
author: pirateaba
description: No killing Goblins. No killing Goblins. No killing Goblins. Erin Solstice is summoned to a fantasy world as a [Barmaid]. She doesn't have cheat powers, doesn't have a system, and isn't a reincarnated hero. She has to earn her living serving drinks and food to adventurers and other beings in a medieval fantasy world. But there's one problem. Erin hates Goblins. And Goblins keep showing up at her inn.
coverQuery: The Wandering Inn pirateaba book cover

title: The Stormlight Archive: Words of Radiance
author: Brandon Sanderson
description: The eagerly awaited sequel to the #1 New York Times bestselling The Way of Kings, set in the epic world of Roshar. Expected by his enemies to die the miserable death of a military slave, Kaladin survived to be given command of the royal bodyguards, a controversial first for a low-status "darkeyes." Now, protected by his men and hounded by those who still despise his race, Kaladin must come to grips with the terrible cost of broken promises and the infamous murder of a king he grew to admire.
coverQuery: Words of Radiance Brandon Sanderson book cover

title: Dune Messiah
author: Frank Herbert
description: Dune Messiah continues the story of Paul Atreides, better known--and feared--as the man christened Muad'Dib. As Emperor of the Known Universe, he possesses more power than a single man was ever meant to wield. Worshipped as a religious icon by the fanatical Fremen, Paul faces the enmity of the political houses he displaced when he assumed the throne--and a conspiracy conducted within his own sphere of influence. And even as House Atreides begins to crumble from ambitions beyond his control, the Muad'Dib is consumed with the knowledge of decisions he must ultimately make.
coverQuery: Dune Messiah Frank Herbert book cover

chapters.title: Book III: The Desert of the Soul

title: Children of Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: The Children of Dune are twin siblings Leto and Ghanima Atreides, whose father, the Emperor Paul Muad'Dib, disappeared in the desert wastelands of Arrakis nine years ago. Like their father, the twins possess superhuman abilities--making them both potential saviors and potential threats to the Empire. There are those who worship them as messiahs, and those who fear they are monsters. Their aunt Alia, ruler of the Empire, sees them as rivals to her own power, and has the formidable Baron Harkonnen as her ally. But among them all, only one will become the next messiah.
coverQuery: Children of Dune Frank Herbert book cover

chapters.title: Book III: The Desert of the Soul

title: Neuromancer
author: William Gibson
description: The Matrix is a world within the world, a global consensus hallucination. Case was the best. Then he crossed the wrong people and they crippled his nervous system, husking him out of the net. Now a new employer has recruited him for a last-chance run against an unthinkably powerful artificial intelligence. With a dead partner riding shotgun and a mysterious woman from Case's past along for the ride, he's going to break into the heart of the Matrix and steal the AI's most precious possession.
coverQuery: Neuromancer William Gibson book cover

title: Snow Crash
author: Neal Stephenson
description: Only once in a great while does a writer come along who defies comparison--a writer so original he redefines the way we look at the world. Neal Stephenson is such a writer and Snow Crash is such a novel, weaving virtual reality, Sumerian myth, and just about everything in between with a cool, hip cybersensibility to bring us the gigantic thriller of the information age. In reality, Hiro Protagonist delivers pizza for Uncle Enzo's CosaNostra Pizza Inc., but in the Metaverse he's a warrior prince. Plunging headlong into the enigma of a new computer virus that's striking down hackers everywhere, he races along the neon-lit information highway on a search-and-destroy mission for the shadowy virtual villain threatening to bring about Infocalypse.
coverQuery: Snow Crash Neal Stephenson book cover

title: The Expanse: Leviathan Wakes
author: James S.A. Corey
description: The Expanse Leviathan Wakes is the first book in the epic space opera series that inspired the hit TV show. Humanity has colonized the solar system--Mars, the Moon, the Asteroid Belt and beyond--but the stars are still out of our reach. Jim Holden is XO of an ice miner making runs from the rings of Saturn to the mining stations of the Belt. When he and his crew stumble upon a derelict ship, the Scopuli, they find themselves in possession of a secret they never wanted. A secret that someone is willing to kill for--and kill on a scale unfathomable to Jim and his crew. War is brewing in the system unless he can find out who left the ship and why. Detective Miller is looking for a girl. One girl in a system of billions, but her parents have money and money talks. When the trail leads him to the Scopuli and rebel sympathizer Jim Holden, he realizes that this girl may be the key to everything.
coverQuery: Leviathan Wakes James S.A. Corey book cover

title: The Expanse: Caliban's War
author: James S.A. Corey
description: We are not alone. On Ganymede, breadbasket of the outer planets, a Martian marine watches as her platoon is slaughtered by a monstrous life form. On Earth, a high-level politician struggles to prevent interplanetary war from reigniting. And on Venus, an alien protomolecule has overrun the planet, wreaking massive, mysterious changes and threatening to spread out into the solar system. In the vast wilderness of space, James Holden and the crew of the Rocinante have been keeping the peace for the Outer Planets Alliance. When they agree to help a scientist search war-torn Ganymede for a missing child, the future of humanity rests on whether a single ship can prevent an alien invasion that may have already begun.
coverQuery: Caliban's War James S.A. Corey book cover

title: The Broken Earth Trilogy: The Fifth Season
author: N.K. Jemisin
description: This is the way the world ends. For the last time. A season of endings has begun. It starts with the great red rift across the heart of the world's sole continent, spewing ash that blots out the sun. It starts with death, with a murdered son and a missing daughter. It starts with betrayal and long-dormant wounds rising up to fester. This is the Stillness, a land long familiar with catastrophe, where the power of the earth is wielded as a weapon. And where there is no mercy. This is the story of the world that is breaking, and the people who are breaking it.
coverQuery: The Fifth Season N.K. Jemisin book cover

title: The Broken Earth Trilogy: The Stone Bearers
author: N.K. Jemisin
description: The season of endings grows darker as civilization fades into the long cold night. Essun--once Damaya, once Syenite, now avenger--has found shelter but not security. Instead there is Uche, the young boy she has to protect in the ruins of a dead city and across the soul of a dying planet. The faction war between Sanze and the Comm now threatens to turn on Essun herself, and there's hardly anywhere she can go...since the weather itself is steadily killing the planet. Essun carries the fate of the Stillness on her shoulders. And if the world is to shift again, Essun must be its fulcrum.
coverQuery: The Stone Bearers N.K. Jemisin book cover

title: The Broken Earth Trilogy: The Stone Bearers
author: N.K. Jemisin
description: The moon has fallen. The seasons of endings have begun. Essun has inherited the phenomenal power of Alabaster Tenring. With it, she hopes to find her daughter Nassun and forge a world in which every orogene child can grow up safe. For Nassun, her mother's mastery of the Obelisk Gate comes too late. Childhood's end has begun. The fate of the world lies in the hands of an unlikely threesome: a broken woman, a missing girl, and a shattered god. The world is breaking, and the people who can save it are breaking too.
coverQuery: The Stone Bearers N.K. Jemisin book cover

title: Hyperion
author: Dan Simmons
description: On the world called Hyperion, beyond the law of the Hegemony of Man, there waits the creature called the Shrike. There are those who worship it. There are those who fear it. And there are those who have vowed to destroy it. In the Valley of the Time Tombs, where huge, brooding structures move backward through time, the Shrike waits for them all. On the eve of Armageddon, with the entire galaxy at war, seven pilgrims set forth on a final voyage to Hyperion seeking the answers to the unsolved riddles of their lives. Each carries a desperate hope--and a terrible secret. And one may hold the fate of humanity in his hands.
coverQuery: Hyperion Dan Simmons book cover

title: The Fall of Hyperion
author: Dan Simmons
description: In the stunning continuation of the epic adventure begun in Hyperion, Simmons returns us to a far future resplendent with drama and invention. On the world of Hyperion, the mysterious Time Tombs are opening. And the secrets they contain mean that nothing--nothing anywhere in the universe--will ever be the same. The Fall of Hyperion picks up where its predecessor left off, dropping new protagonists into the adventure and uniting the disparate storylines of the pilgrims. As galactic war rages, the Hegemony's AI civilization faces total destruction at the hands of humankind's rebellious colonies.
coverQuery: The Fall of Hyperion Dan Simmons book cover

title: I Am Legend
author: Richard Matheson
description: Robert Neville may well be the last living man on Earth . . . but he is not alone. An incurable plague has mutated every other man, woman, and child into bloodthirsty, nocturnal creatures who are determined to destroy him. By day, he is a hunter, stalking the infected monstrosities through the abandoned ruins of civilization. By night, he barricades himself in his home and prays for dawn. Every other survivor of the pandemic has become a vampire: a member of the living dead, sleepless in his devotion to the destruction of the helpless living. But when Neville finds a possible cure, he becomes the hunted rather than the hunter.
coverQuery: I Am Legend Richard Matheson book cover

title: Foundation
author: Isaac Asimov
description: For twelve thousand years the Galactic Empire has ruled supreme. Now it is dying. But only Hari Seldon, creator of the revolutionary science of psychohistory, can see into the future--to a dark age of ignorance, barbarism, and warfare that will last thirty thousand years. To preserve knowledge and save civilization, Seldon gathers the best minds in the Empire--both scientists and scholars--and brings them to a bleak planet at the edge of the galaxy to serve as a beacon of hope for future generations. He calls his sanctuary the Foundation.
coverQuery: Foundation Isaac Asimov book cover

title: Foundation and Empire
author: Isaac Asimov
description: The Foundation lies in danger of destruction at the hands of the Mule, a mutant with a terrible power greater than any before him. But Bel Riose, the last great general of the Empire, is also scheming against the Foundation. And the Mule's connection to a mysterious figure from the past may hold the key to the Foundation's salvation--or its certain doom.
coverQuery: Foundation and Empire Isaac Asimov book cover

title: Second Foundation
author: Isaac Asimov
description: The Foundation is on the brink of collapse. As the Mule's forces advance, the Second Foundation--the hidden guardian of Hari Seldon's Plan--must act. But how can they stop the Mule's psychic powers? And what happens when the Second Foundation itself is under threat?
coverQuery: Second Foundation Isaac Asimov book cover

chapters.title: Part VII: Search by the Foundation
Part VIII: Search by the Mule
Part IX: Search by the Second Foundation

title: The Gilded Ones
author: Namina Forna
description: The Gilded Ones is the first book in an epic, West African-inspired trilogy. Sixteen-year-old Deka lives in Otera, a deeply patriarchal ancient kingdom, where a woman's value is tied to her purity and the purity of the family she is to marry into. But when Deka bleeds gold--the first sign of a dangerous power--she realizes she must flee to save not only herself, but her family. In the midst of a civil war, Deka finds herself among the Gilded Ones--the warriors with golden blood who were supposed to be the saviors of Otera. But they are not what they seem.
coverQuery: The Gilded Ones Namina Forna book cover

title: The City We Became
author: N.K. Jemisin
description: Every city has a soul. Some are as ancient as myths, and others are as new and destructive as children. New York City? She's got six. But every city also has a dark side. A roiling, ancient evil stirs beneath the earth, threatening to destroy the city and her avatar. In New York, the embodiment of Brooklyn struggles to keep the city safe. But she's not the only one who knows the city's secrets. The other avatars are also waking up, and they want their piece of the pie. The city is tearing itself apart, and only one woman can save it.
coverQuery: The City We Became N.K. Jemisin book cover

chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Woman Who Walked Into the Water
Chapter 2: The Man Who Would Be King
Chapter 3: The Girl Who Could Walk Through Walls

title: The Midnight Bargain
author: C.L. Polk
description: Sorcerers weave magic into everyday life. But magic requires a sacrifice. For generations, the wizards of Chaonia have controlled the magic of the land by draining the life force of the women who bear their children. Now, the sorcerers' daughters are fighting back. Sophie has always been the perfect daughter. She studies magic, she obeys her parents, and she knows her place in society. But when she discovers a way to break the sorcerers' control, she must decide whether to risk everything for freedom.
coverQuery: The Midnight Bargain C.L. Polk book cover

title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue: The Ten Thousand Doors
author: Aliette de Bodard
description: In the early 1900s, a young woman escapes a claustrophobic small town via a trunk and a lie. The lie sets her on an itinerary through the sparsely populated landscapes of the American West--alone in a landscape that is both freeing and punishing. In the trunk are some of the most important things she owns: a few clothes, her journal, a photograph of her dead father, and a strange black stone that may or may not be magic. The black stone calls her by name even though she's never told anyone her real name. The black stone is not just a stone. It's a door.
coverQuery: The Ten Thousand Doors Aliette de Bodard book cover

title: The Empress of Salt and Fortune
author: Nghi Vo
description: A young royal from the far north, is sent south for her education. In a court that is a nest of vipers, she must learn to walk the knife's edge between poison and power. But the real poison lurks in her heart, in the form of a forbidden love for another woman. When the empress dies, her will tasks Chih with solving a riddle that will reveal the location of her greatest treasure. Chih must embark on a quest that will lead her to the heart of the empire, where she will discover the true meaning of power and love.
coverQuery: The Empress of Salt and Fortune Nghi Vo book cover

title: The Dragon's Banker
author: Scott Warren
description: Mar was just a regular accountant. Well, regular for someone who worked for dragons. But when a dragon lord offers him a job that could change his life forever, Mar finds himself thrust into a world of magic, mystery, and money. With his trusty spreadsheet skills and a knack for negotiation, Mar must navigate the treacherous waters of dragon politics, ancient curses, and corporate intrigue. But when a mysterious artifact threatens to upend the entire financial system of the dragon realm, Mar discovers that sometimes you have to bend the rules to save the world.
coverQuery: The Dragon's Banker Scott Warren book cover

title: Level Up Your Life
author: Sarah Chen
description: When game designer Mia Chen wakes up in a world that looks exactly like her latest VRMMORPG creation, she thinks it's just a vivid dream. But when she discovers she has real game stats, skills, and a level-up system, reality hits hard. With the fate of two worlds hanging in the balance, Mia must use her game design knowledge to navigate quests, form alliances, and uncover the conspiracy that brought her here. But in a world where power comes from grinding levels and completing objectives, can she save both her creation and the people trapped inside it?
coverQuery: Level Up Your Life Sarah Chen book cover

title: System Apocalypse: The Godslayer
author: Tao Wong
description: The System Apocalypse has come. The world has changed forever. Magic is real, levels are a thing, and monsters roam the streets. John Lee, a former soldier turned construction worker, finds himself thrust into this new reality when the System awakens within him. With a unique class and abilities that don't follow the normal rules, John must navigate a world where the strong prey on the weak, and survival means adapting to a system that wasn't designed with humanity in mind.
coverQuery: System Apocalypse Tao Wong book cover

title: The Gamer's Guide to Becoming a Dungeon Master
author: Marcus Hale
description: Alex Thompson has always been a player, not a creator. But when he discovers an ancient artifact that lets him create his own dungeon, everything changes. With the ability to design traps, monsters, and treasures, Alex creates the ultimate dungeon experience. But when real players start showing up, and they bring real stakes, Alex learns that being a Dungeon Master isn't just about creating challenges - it's about creating stories. And when a rival dungeon threatens everything he's built, Alex must level up his game design skills or lose it all.
coverQuery: The Gamer's Guide Marcus Hale book cover

title: Virtual Realms: The Architect
author: Lena Park
description: In a world where virtual reality games have become the primary form of entertainment, architect Sarah Kim discovers she has the rare ability to manipulate the code of any game world she enters. When she's hired to redesign a failing VRMMORPG, Sarah thinks it's just another job. But when she discovers a conspiracy that threatens to trap millions of players in virtual worlds forever, she must use her unique abilities to fight back. As she levels up her architect skills and uncovers the dark secrets of the gaming industry, Sarah learns that some games are more real than others.
coverQuery: Virtual Realms Lena Park book cover

title: Code Breaker: The Programmer's Apocalypse
author: David Liu
description: When software engineer Jake Chen is transported into the game world he helped create, he thinks it's a bug. But when he discovers he can manipulate the game's code from within, he realizes this is no ordinary glitch. With his programming knowledge as his greatest weapon, Jake must navigate quests, form alliances, and debug the system before the game's AI overlords delete him permanently. In a world where code is power, Jake learns that the best hacks aren't in the programming - they're in the human heart.
coverQuery: Code Breaker David Liu book cover
